resource.documentation: Provide details on what can be done on the AuditEvent resource

interaction.documentation: Searches AuditEvent instances based on the search criteria provided

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Patient reference for which the AuditEvent instances should be fetched

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time when the event was recorded. System SHALL support 'ge', 'le' and 'eq' search as per FHIR standard

searchParam.name: action
searchParam.documentation: Type of action performed during the event

resource.documentation: Provide details on what can be done on the DocumentReference resource

interaction.documentation: Searches FHIR document metadata instances based on the search criteria provided

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Master Version Specific Identifier. Document id in the source system (if available and provided during the document persistance)

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Type code of the document to fetch

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Class code of the document to fetch

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status of the document to fetch allowed values are current | superseded | entered-in-erro

searchParam.name: indexed
searchParam.documentation: When this document reference was created. The system should support 'ge','le','eq' searches as defined in FHIR

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what authored the document
